SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Controller

Class LobbyController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Controller.LobbyController
public class LobbyController extends Object
The LobbyController class serves as the controller for the lobby. It handles operations related to managing users in the lobby and executing lobby-specific commands.

    • LobbyController

      public LobbyController(Lobby model)
      Constructs a LobbyController object with the specified lobby model.

  • Method Details

    • joinLobby

      public void joinLobby(ServerUser serverUser, ClientHandler ch) throws LobbyClosedException, LobbyUserAlreadyConnectedException
      Allows a server user to join the lobby using the provided client handler.
      Parameters:
      serverUser - The server user attempting to join the lobby.
      ch - The client handler associated with the server user.
      Throws:
      LobbyClosedException - If the lobby is closed and cannot accept new users.
      LobbyUserAlreadyConnectedException - If the user is already connected to the lobby.

    • userDisconnectionProcedure

      public void userDisconnectionProcedure(String username)
      Handles the disconnection procedure of a user from the lobby.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user to disconnect.

    • quitLobby

      public void quitLobby(String username)
      Quits the lobby for the specified user.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user quitting the lobby.

    • getGameController

      public GameController getGameController()
      Retrieves the game controller associated with the lobby.
      Returns:
      The GameController object associated with the lobby.

    • startGame

      public void startGame(String username) throws AdminRoleRequiredException, InvalidLobbySizeToStartGameException, GameAlreadyStartedException
      Starts the game associated with the lobby.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user requesting to start the game.
      Throws:
      AdminRoleRequiredException - If the user does not have admin privileges to start the game.
      InvalidLobbySizeToStartGameException - If the lobby size is insufficient to start the game.
      GameAlreadyStartedException

    • changeColor

      public void changeColor(String username, LobbyUserColors newColor) throws UnavailableLobbyUserColorException
      Changes the color of a user in the lobby.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user whose color is being changed.
      newColor - The new color to assign to the user.
      Throws:
      UnavailableLobbyUserColorException - If the requested color is unavailable or already taken.

    • sendChatMessage

      public void sendChatMessage(ChatMessageRecord chatMessage) throws NoSuchRecipientException, InvalidRecipientException
      Sends a chat message to recipients within the lobby.
      Parameters:
      chatMessage - The chat message record containing message details.
      Throws:
      NoSuchRecipientException - If the recipient specified in the message does not exist.
      InvalidRecipientException - If the recipient specified is invalid for the message.

    • addGameControllerObserver

      public void addGameControllerObserver(String username, GameControllerObserver observer)
      Adds a game controller observer for receiving updates related to game state changes.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the observer.
      observer - The game controller observer to add.

    • getLobbyName

      public String getLobbyName()
      Retrieves the name of the lobby.
      Returns:
      The name of the lobby.
